email.subject: Time for fun
email.body:
Wow, you have impressed me getting into SEATTLE DATANET. Good job!
Now, it's time to get serious:
----------------------------------------------------------------- I want you to get access to "THE WORLD ISP" - from there, we can access all subnetworks on the US West Coast! -----------------------------------------------------------------
TIP: you need to look out for "tracking" on high-level computers - and remember to delete "logs" on remote computers you connect to. Otherwise the FBI (or other hackers) may track you down!
Good luck, - Jim (and Malvin)
Seattle Tech Lab
